name: Ohio Invasion: Conquest
description:
Build a army of demons to slowly take over Ohio, take the souls of Ohio citizens while building various buildings with different purposes such as generating money or summoning more demons to add to your ever growing army.

Game for the 53rd Godot Wild Jam following the theme "Assembly Required".

Currency info:

$ - Dollars: aka the main currency

S - Souls, the secondary more rare currency

Controls:

Left click drag - Move camera around

Left click - Interact with gold mines

Right click - Bring up interaction menu

Scroll wheel - Zoom in and out

Esc - Pause menu

Credits: Programming:Peanut, Identity TheftArt:Kenney NL, Badploptop, Identity TheftAudio:Kenney NL, Krotos Audio, AudibleDread, StormwaveAudio
